title: New: A$AP Rocky – Celebration
body:
Earlier this evening BBC Sound of 2012 nominee **A$AP Rocky** dropped an unreleased track via his [Twitter](https://twitter.com/#!/liveloveasap/status/158327762367692801). _Celebration_ finds him paraphrasing **Kanye West**, yet delivering in a raw, unabashed style similar to **Lil Wayne**. The production is slick and ready for the mainstream; fairly appropriate when you consider that he’ll be touring with **Drake** over the next few months. With the success of last years _**LiveLoveA$AP**_, the pressure is on for him to come up with the goods on his sophomore record. It’s unclear as to whether this new cut will feature on next months _**A$AP MOB**_.

 [A$AP Rocky – Celebration (Unreleased)](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad/a-ap-rocky-celebration) by [crackintheroad](http://soundcloud.com/crackintheroad)
